mapper.select: select np.id,np.city_name cityName,np.resource, np.net_type netType,ch.channel,np.price,np.low_consume lowConsume,n.num_level numLevel,ifnull(a.commpay_name,'默认') commpayName,DATE_FORMAT(np.add_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') addDate from tb_num_price np inner join tb_num n on np.num_id = n.id left join tb_channel ch on np.channel=ch.channel_id and ch.corp_id=np.corp_id left join tb_agent a on a.id= np.agent_id and a.is_del=0 left join tb_corp_agent ca on ca.agent_id=a.id and ca.status=2 and ca.corp_id=np.corp_id where np.is_del=0 and ch.is_del=0 and n.status = 2 and np.corp_id=#{param.corpId} and np.channel = #{param.channel} and np.resource like "%"#{param.resource}"%" and (np.agent_id = -1 or np.agent_id = #{param.agentId}) order by np.num_id
mapper.update: update tb_num_price p set p.feature = REPLACE(p.feature,#{feature},',') where p.is_del = 0 and p.feature REGEXP ".*"#{feature}".*";
update tb_num n set n.is_freeze = #{param.isFreeze} where n.id=#{param.id}
mapper.select: select a.price ,ifnull(b.price,a.price) agentPrice from (select np.price,np.num_id from tb_num_price np where np.num_id=#{param.numId} and np.agent_id=-1 and np.is_del=0 and np.channel=#{param.channel}) a left join (select np.price,np.num_id from tb_num_price np where np.num_id=#{param.numId} and np.agent_id=#{param.agentId} and np.is_del=0 and np.channel=#{param.channel}) b on a.num_id=b.num_id
select count(1) from tb_num_price np where np.resource=#{resource} and np.is_del=0 and np.channel=#{param.channel} and np.corp_id=#{param.corpId} and (np.agent_id=-1 or np.agent_id=#{param.agentId})
mapper.delete: delete npa from tb_num_price_agent npa, tb_num n where npa.num_id = n.id and n.`status` in (6,8,9)
mapper.update: update tb_num_price_agent npa , tb_num_price np set npa.price=np.price where npa.exc_price=0 and np.agent_id=-1 and npa.price!=np.price and np.is_del=0 and npa.num_price_id = np.id

update tb_num_price_agent npa , tb_num_price np set npa.price=np.price,npa.exc_price=1 where npa.agent_id=np.agent_id and np.agent_id!=-1 and npa.num_id=np.num_id and npa.price!=np.price and np.is_del=0
update tb_num_price_agent npa join tb_num n on npa.num_id=n.id set npa.status=n.status,npa.is_freeze=n.is_freeze where n.id = #{numId}
